title: Wadi Qitna
description: Late Roman-Early Byzantine cemetery at the point where the Wadi Qitna met the Nile. The graves were tumuli and covered 1200 meters. The site was deluged upon the creation of the High Aswan Dam.

properties.description: Approximate imagery location based on Google Earth of Wadi Qitna after Strouhal 1984.
properties.title: Approximate imagery location of Wadi Qitna
